message: Loved the original, can't get into the new one.
The new one is hit/miss for me. Like the last episode was good.
Man I liked it at first, and every episode makes me like it less :\
The blonde chick is hot !! I like it ;)
I enjoy it. It's not great television, but it's entertaining to me.
Hello all, Im watching V.2009 TV-show now.. seems good

Its funny, because the only thing that does not have a soul is this show. Its empty and grey. Plots are to complex and everyones a good guy and a bad guy. That was fine for Galactica but no what I would expect in a V remake.
loved the old one. 50:50 on the new one. still at Season2 episode 3 (days to short)
I am not liking  the religious things. That thing of soul and that kind of garbage.
I watched the first two episodes of the new V and then stopped. It is poorly written, in my opinion.
This show is real s$%@ once translated in French. I switched to english, not much better :s
I like it, it's interesting.
Good show
hmm, now i think about it i dont think she was a mother but Faye Grant's character was one of the main leaders if not the main leader

i think that the main thing keeping V alive is the fans of the old show.. i think in a lot of ways it's a better and more believable show than the first one... but the characters from the older show were easier to identify with
